titleStmt.title: The cry and reuenge of blood Expressing the nature and haynousnesse of wilfull murther. Exemplified in a most lamentable history thereof, committed at Halsworth in High Suffolk, and lately conuicted at Bury assize, 1620.
titleStmt.author: Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.

titleStmt.title: The cry and reuenge of blood Expressing the nature and haynousnesse of wilfull murther. Exemplified in a most lamentable history thereof, committed at Halsworth in High Suffolk, and lately conuicted at Bury assize, 1620.
titleStmt.author: Cooper, Thomas, fl. 1626.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Nicholas Okes, for Iohn Wright, dwelling in Pie-corner,

notesStmt.note: Concerning the murder by one Norton of three members of the Leeson family.
Some running titles read: The cry and reuenge of bloud.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
